text: Trying to workout a nontrivial pullback manually is really giving me a new appreciation for how powerful AD really is...

elements.text: Trying to workout a nontrivial pullback manually is really giving me a new appreciation for how powerful AD really is...

text: Even when the pullback is really not that complicated, writing it all down with math can take a ton of space. It's so nice that AD can usually just sort it out.

elements.text: Even when the pullback is really not that complicated, writing it all down with math can take a ton of space. It's so nice that AD can usually just sort it out.

text: Yes, especially when there are a couple of tensor indices involved, I just always get confused
